::Battera::

She felt like a coward. She never ran from a fight before. And now she felt 
like she had dishonored herself. She turned and let go of the branch she was 
hanging onto and flew off leaving Cybershark near the tree.  She didn't want 
anyone to know that she was alive.  Not that she feared for her life.  It 
was that she felt like her life wasn't worh scrap.  She just wanted to try 
to forget what happened.  If the others in HellBeast's base were dead, then 
she survived.  But if they were alive, she was a coward.  She knew that she 
could never go back there ever again or she would be killed for sure.  She 
flew u[ into the air currents, letting the breeze carry her to any which way 
the wind went.  She looked up and thought she saw a hugh red bird like 
creature.  She shook her head.
"Nah, my mental circuits are playing tricks on me."
